CustomField.description: This is the software entitlement to which the feature is related. Once set, this should never be changed.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the software entitlement to which the feature is related.
CustomField.label: Software Entitlement

lookupFilter.errorMessage: This can only be related to a single entitlement.
lookupFilter.infoMessage: This can only be related to a single entitlement.
